title: july 21: diversity training for superheroes? (with Will Hyde)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Marvel’s 2019 announcement of 10 upcoming superhero films, many of which feature a much more diverse cast than past Marvel movies. After, she’s joined by special guest Will Hyde. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
